meanings.sent1: I will prearrange the meeting for next week.
meanings.sent2: She likes to prearrange her schedule for the month.
meanings.sent3: Let's prearrange a surprise party for her birthday!
meanings.sent4: He prearranged his escape like a mastermind.
meanings.sent5: The students prearranged their study group to ace the exam.

meanings.sent1: They prearrange their travel plans to avoid last-minute stress.
meanings.sent2: The event coordinator will prearrange all the details for the conference.
meanings.sent3: We should prearrange a backup plan just in case.
meanings.sent4: She prearranged her outfit for the party to match her friend's.
meanings.sent5: The team prearranged their strategy to win the game.
